# `InstagramDataIngestionRuleRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | The name of the data ingestion rule. |
| description | `string` | No | A description of the data ingestion rule. |
| integrationId | `string` | Yes | The Integration Id from which public social posts are ingested. This entity is created using the /conversations/messaging/integrations/instagram resource |
